text: EW asks Gal Gadot about the moment she knew Wonder Woman was a hit, which scenes across her three DC movies was her favorite, what she thought of James Cameron ’ s slam, and much more. Below the actress — one of EW ’ s Entertainers of the Year — takes our questions in a deep - dive Q & A recounting her incredible past year. ENTERTAINMENT WEEKLY : At the start of 2017, Wonder Woman had wrapped principal production months ago, fans obviously saw you in Batman v Superman, the first trailer for the standalone film had come out. What were your expectations, did you know you had something special that point? Gal Gadot : There ’ s always how you feel about something but you never know how it ’
